input_args.passage: 'Yōko Shōji (Author of Popcorn) | 庄司陽子 [Shōji Yōko] is a Japanese manga artist. She is best known for writing Seito Shokun! (Attention Students!), for which she won the Kodansha Manga ... Rating: 4, \u200e45 votes'
